Spinister nodded, and bowed deeply to his leader. A good run with
Needlenose, that's what he needed. He backed away, then when out of the
room turned around, Singe leapt up into the air, and transformed, as
Spinister caught him. On his way out, Apeface passed him in his robot
mode. Apeface barged into Havotron's room.

"Havotron, Tremor located Slugslinger, and should be back soon, but
Jagged and Nightmare have disapeared." Apeface grunted.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Spinister entered Needlenoses room. He looked at his long time
comerade's eyes, then motioned with his thumb to the door, and turned
around and headed towards the exit again.
